Hello,

I'm making an antispam stuff that oper on the content level, so I p=
lan to execute this module juste before extractorHTML (or maybe replace it)=
. It will detect and mark the page as web spam based on some criteria.

Wha=
t I want to do if the page is marked as spam is to nofollow the links (like=
 it was meta tag nofollow or something).

However, I don't like how H3 is h=
andling nofollow directive, it just stop link extraction. I want them to be=
 extracted because I want them to appear in outlinks (uri.getOutLinks() in =
my WriterProcessor), but I don't want them to be added to the crawl queue (=
unless there is the same outlinks on a page which is not marked as spam).

=
Is it possible to code such a module or does it take too deep to the H3 cor=
e ?
